name: Voxel Knight
description:
Voxel Knight, is a rogue-like, hack & slash, action RPG game made by four university students in 3 months. 

Take control of a hero that will adventure through the haunted forest, it will not be an easy one and you will face many evil creatures but the realm counts on you to take down the Lich!

We see potential in our game and we would like to share with all of you to get some feedback, let us know how would you improve the game.

Most of the controls can be changed via the settings menu, just press ESC (Escape) in game to access it. These are the controls that cannot be changed:

  • WASD - Movement but forward is defined by mouse position
  • Space - Roll
  • Right Mouse Button - Sell/Equip/Dequip
  • Left Mouse Button - Attack/Buy
